subject: Baseball
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Shelley Duncan had taken batting practice at Yankee Stadium before he was 15 years old. On Friday, however, he walked into the clubhouse not as a guest, but as a player.
snippet: Shelley Duncan had taken batting practice at Yankee Stadium before he was 15 years old. On Friday, however, he walked into the clubhouse not as a guest, but as a player.
